website_summaries.verdict: Ever printed on an airplane? What about from a cell phone? The go-anywhere Canon iP90 offers worlds of possibilities--for a price.
pros: Good print quality for graphics and photos
cons: For true cordless portability, you'll need a battery that costs $100

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer for Traveling!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this printer and it just stopped. I had plenty of ink and purchased this used one and it was the perfect replacement for my printer. It was packaged well and was shipped very quickly. We are on vacation in the Sierras and use it a lot, so it was a blessing to have my printer back.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D. Haraway

customer_reviews.title: Canon ip90
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer for it's portability and bluetooth capability to use when I travel by RV. This is the second Canon printer I own, the other an i9900. Both are fast and produce outstaniding results with little or no problems. In brief, I am extremely happy with my new ip90. The only drawback is that when you purchase the battery pack and bluetooth adapter, both being optional, the cost is pretty high (around $400), which is about what my i9900 cost new two years ago. However, I am glad I purchased it because it fits exactly what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: convenient and portable printer
customer_reviews.text: The Canon Pixma iP90 is appealing mainly for its size and portability. It is easily included in travel with a laptop. It does a fairly good job in color photograph printing but the colors don't match the screen as well as my non-portable color printer, the Canon i950. The ink cartridges are quite small so any significant amount of printing means the expense and inconvenience of buying and carrying extra cartridges. Setup was easy and with no glitches. There really was no other portable printer options worth considering so I am fairly pleased. It does a decent job in "monochrome" for printing black and white text such as emails and Word documents.
customer_reviews.author: Peter E. Safir

customer_reviews.title: Purchase a use one, Item wasn't in operating condition ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase a use one, Item wasn't in operating condition. Lights and all work, Laptop recognize connection via USB connection Microsoft Word Document transmission resisted Printer acknowledge but would not print. Only eject blank sheets. Brought sense "Never buy use Products"
customer_reviews.author: Melvin T. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Canon PIXMA iP90 Photo Inkjet Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer for someone who wants a very small compact printer that will print good pictures. It is very portable and quiet. I really like this one. The only two problems or negatives are the fact that the battery does not come with it which may disappoint someone who will use this as a strictly portable printer. Secondly, the ink cartridges, which need to be small, really don't last that long so it would be a good idea to have a couple of spares.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We really like this printer. Very fast and stingy with the 2 ink cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Meek

customer_reviews.title: Great travel printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is small, lightweight and easy to take on trips. Helps me plan travel when on the road by using Mapquest and then printing out the route. Also great for checking in early for flights when traveling and printing out boarding passes. People send e-mails and drawings to me when on the road, and I can print them out immediately. Print quality is unbelievable for such a compact unit. Canon support when I had a problem was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Dilbert

customer_reviews.title: The printer worked fine it was just the problem with the software updates
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the product I decided to purchase a new printer since the software for this printer could not be updated on our computers. The printer worked fine it was just the problem with the software updates.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wohleb

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but a bit fragile
customer_reviews.text: I got this nice little printer because I needed to squeeze it into a tight place. It is really tiny--only a few inches thick when closed, and it prints clearly and quickly. It is a bit fragile, however. It stopped working suddenly about a month after I got it. The company sent a replacement immediately, and that one's been working fine for months. Customer service was good, and shipping back was pre-paid and easy.
customer_reviews.author: C.W. Knits

customer_reviews.title: Goes through ink cartridges like there's no tomorrow
customer_reviews.text: The ink cartridges are very small. As a result, they run out very very quickly, and need almost constant replacement. I've had to replace the b&w and color cartridges practically every month, and I don't even do that much printing. Anyway, just something to keep in mind. It's tiny. It works great. But it's pricey, and you'll be buying tiny (and expensive) replacement ink cartridges often.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stamatis

customer_reviews.title: Handy Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer as a portable to use with my laptop for real estate transactions "in the field". I find myself using it frequently at home when I need a quick color print. I don't use it for photos, so I can't comment on that. For business graphics it is great. Fast, quiet and portable. The only negative I've found is the paper handling is marginal. It often will feed more than one sheet of paper at a time, so it needs attention to get a satisfactory multi-page print job. I'm using "compatible" ink cartridges. This saves tons of $$$ and so far seems to work fine. I'd buy this printer again!
customer_reviews.author: William Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great item to travel with..
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a compact printer to go with your laptop...then this is it. The only suggestion I would have to improve this printer is to have a LARGE Black and White ink supply instead of the color option. I don't need color when I travel and I am just trying to get a hard copy for someone else usually. Otherwise, it is just dandy.
customer_reviews.author: CHET C.

customer_reviews.title: when it deliverd, it has been out of oder ...
customer_reviews.text: when it deliverd, it has been out of oder. Acc.to CANON KOREA, no way to repait it as there is no spare part all over the world. It is rubbish printer, even though it looks to be smart
customer_reviews.author: Some user of IP 90

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact printer for one on the road. Optional battery lasts forever between charges. Actually, have only needed to charge it once in over a month now! Unlike the junk HP printers, this one works great. It is a little heavy with the battery attached but small enough to easily carry in laptop bag. This sharp looking printer won't let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: Superb value
customer_reviews.text: This little printer is one of the best investments I've ever made. It is light, fast, and does a superb job. Even printing high resolution photographs is first-rate. If I have one criticism it is that the ink cartrridges do not have a larger capacity. But, they are so inexpensive that it is no effort to have many of them in reserve. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Ross Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer two years ago in Iraq. If that environment and travel didn't hurt this printer, than nothing can. It has worked great ever since, and is really compact and prints wonderful pictures on photo paper. I would highly recommend this printer, and thanks go out to Amazon for shipping this to Iraq for me. Yeah Amazon :-)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Canon printer
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a similar printer by Canon and it lasted 10 yrs (BJ-10). The next one lasted about 2 years, but I travel extensively and exposed it to a dusty harsh industrial environment. I currently have owned the iP-90 for a year and it performs well without any problems other that when I forget to fluff the paper in the feeder and two sheets are fed thru. Several of my clients have seen me use this printer and have purchased one too. It is more expensive than other printers, but the size and quality beat the rest hands down. It easily fits into my computer bag so I always have a good printer on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dumbauld

customer_reviews.title: Small Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: You won't find another printer this small and portable. At least I couldn't. It works fine but durability is an issue. Mine is well protected in checked luggage yet I am on my third one in four years. I don't use it for photos so can't comment on photo quality but inkjet print quality is fine. Its reasonably fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Music Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: great printer!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this printer. Canon doesn't make these small printers any more, which I don't understand. It is small enough to fit the corner of my desk right by my computer, and it prints beautiful pictures as well as just ordinary printing.
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my BJ85
customer_reviews.text: For a portable printer it is great, but not as good as my BJ85 which finally gave out after 8 years. This one, which in my opinion is constructed of lesser quality plastic, doesn't appear as hardy as the BJ85 was and shakes my desk when it is printing. Appears to be slower too. I haven't had it long enough to give it a rating of 5 and am not sure whether I'd ever do so. I think, however, that it was well worth its price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This small printer has to be the best investment I have made in years. Portable/easily stored/ dependable/ well built and prints perfect forms and pictures every time. I do not use the battery in that I have a 110V hook-up in my truck which is a mobile office at the job site. Would highly recommend to anyone wanting quality and performance!
customer_reviews.author: Russell M. Cowley

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer based on the positive reviews. It does a great job. I print mainly photos and every once and awhile a web page. It doesn't seem to format to web pages very well. But will continue trying. I really wanted it for photos which print great for my uses. It is small enough to fit in most cases when on the road or vacation. That way printing can be done right there instead of waiting to get home to see those great shots!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a portable printer for work related printing needs out in the field. I was very excited when I received this printer because of it's size. Unfortunately, set up was a nightmare. I was on the phone with Canon support three days in a row and couldn't get it to print. Canon finally ended up sending me an iP100 replacement because the print head was defective on the iP90. Then the iP100 that was sent wouldn't work and I had to send it in for repair. I have never been this disappointed with a Canon product.
customer_reviews.author: jbull

customer_reviews.title: older modell better than new one
customer_reviews.text: it'sa older model. I like it very much. My first one broke. So I bought this one, used it works good until now.
customer_reviews.author: NINA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Pixma iP90 we have bought for our ogranization. We all love it. It is easy to install and use. It's lightwieght portability is a great plus. I have put mine through some marathon printing sessions without a pause and it has held up well. The cartridges are small, but inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Printer was DOA. All it would it would do ...
customer_reviews.text: Printer was DOA. All it would it would do when turned on was make a loud screeching sound. The printer head would not move at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Cooley

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who travels to various places and is in need of printing research papers. This eliminates having to lug a large printer. Wonderful product, faster printing than my home printer and color beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great little item
customer_reviews.text: We are on vacation in Hawaii although I still need to be able to work. That meant finding a small, light printer that I could take along. This fits the bill perfectly. Works great. Nothing fancy but it is great for just printing out pages.
customer_reviews.author: KSJ

customer_reviews.title: This is a most amazing printer
customer_reviews.text: After years of faithful service, this printer finally failed. But it owes me nothing. It's compact, prints well, and lasts longer than any other printer I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love This Printer
customer_reviews.text: The Pixsma iP90 fits my travel needs perfectly and it does a great job. It is so compact that it fits in easily with my laptop into my carry-on. The only down side is the small ink-jet cartridges, but you can find them fairly cheap online..otherwise I have no complaints, prints great, reasonable speed, fits my needs to a tee!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as a refurbished printer versus a new one
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as a refurbished printer versus a new one. The paper doesn't always catch and it feeds in unevenly when it does so document printing is a little off and paper comes out crumpled on one end
customer_reviews.author: Sunkat

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I had one before, it died, so I knew what to expect. It was advertised as "like new" and generally was. Came with cartridges installed and test print to verify. Good price, prompt shipping. Very pleased with product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Carlengland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact printer
customer_reviews.text: This Canon Pixma iP90 is a perfect portable printer. Mine fits in my computer briefcase and is simple to use. The only drawback (to me) is that because of the size of the printer itself, the ink cartridges are small. Otherwise, a great pick.
customer_reviews.author: alan b gaughan

customer_reviews.title: The BEST printer!!
customer_reviews.text: Great printer. Mine is going to 10 years of usage!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Pixma i90 Photo Inkjet Printer is great!!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy how convenient this product is. Literally plug in your camera, and push the print button on the camera, and you have pictures. Easy to work with the computer too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dalley

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Printer!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is light weight & works great! It is awesome to use when traveling due to size & ease of carrying! Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen LeBoeuf

customer_reviews.title: umm wow.. Love the printer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little printer, fits the bill for a contractor on the road who needs to print his invoices and hand them to customers. very fast, very sleek, price is made up by the convenience
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is all it claims to be. It is light, portable, fast and produces great printing. I love it and take it with me on trips frequently.
customer_reviews.author: RinKC

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice, small footprint, even with optional external battery. Good color photos, quick B&W printing. I got it for portability, but it's got full Canon quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Klipper

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Print out very nice result. Totally portable, easy to set up, & reasonal price. Recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Chau

customer_reviews.title: portable printer
customer_reviews.text: purchased 3 of these and love them all gave for gifts two of them and the people simply love them.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Messersmith

customer_reviews.title: Have printer will travel
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light-weight printer to take on-site, along with my laptop. Based upon the reviews I read, I decided to purchase the Canon PIXMA iP90 inkjet printer. I am very pleased with the ease of operation, size and quality of this machine. The ink tends to be a bit pricey, but it is still worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Great compact printer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, very compact printer. We use it in our motorhome and it takes very little space.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fellows

customer_reviews.title: I THINK ITS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: GOT IT IN THREE DAYS (QUICKER THAN EXPECTED. SET IS RATHER QUICK. PRINT QUALITY AND SPEED IS GREAT. AND OF COURSE I COULDN'T BEET THE PRICE ANYWHERE LOCAL. THANK YOU...
customer_reviews.author: G. Eshenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: pixma
customer_reviews.text: this item is a pleasure to use. It is lighter than my last portable printer. It started working right out of the box after a simple set up to connect to my Pocket PC. It has a pleasant sound as it prints a clear and professional copy.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: great little printer
customer_reviews.text: have had this printer for several years & it hasn't given me a moment of trouble. It takes up very little room; easy to replace ink cartridges; excellent print quality! I would definitely recommend to anyone looking to replace an inkjet printer.
customer_reviews.author: Songnbird

customer_reviews.title: pixma
customer_reviews.text: Handy for our laptops. Prints well. Have it on a separate part of house which it makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Mcgunegle

customer_reviews.title: perfect travel printer
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy little printer produces excellent output of documents and photographs. It's very compact, which makes it ideal for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Platt, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Canon PIXMA iP90 Photo Inkjet Printer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a printer for document and letter production while traveling with my laptop computer. I have not tried the photo option yet. The printer is compact, produces clear and clean printing, is easy to use and easy to transport. I had an initial problem installing the ink cartridge and called the company for help. The company responded promptly and the problem was quickly resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Hickory Ridge Books

customer_reviews.title: Review for the Canon PIXMA iP90 injet printer
customer_reviews.text: We love this printer. It has great quality and is very light. It is portible so it can fit right into your lap top bag. The ink is also very affordable to replace or have filled.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy w

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item from a third party seller. The product was defective - it did, nor does recognize the color ink cartridge when install. The third party refused to reimburse the defective product. I WILL NEVER PURCHASE A THIRD PARTY PRODUCT THROUGH AMAZON AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Canon Product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the features of this Canon mobile printer. Set-up instructions very easy to follow and total time from carton to printing about half hour. An amazing printer for its size. Comprehensive manual included. Light weight compared to laptop. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CW of Maui

customer_reviews.title: A good printer-
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several of these canon porable printers and have been happy with them- They are easly porable(fits in my laptop case w/ease) This new does a bang up job of printing even photos Works well right out of the box The blue tooth doesn't work so well and was extra It could hold more paper, as i often have to reload mid printing
customer_reviews.author: James Fitch

customer_reviews.title: The Great Little Pixma
customer_reviews.text: This printer was purchased so we could have a portable printer for our laptop. The Pixma has done beautifully; it's great to travel with and is easy to set up and use. The color reproduction seems to be good as well. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rochlin

customer_reviews.title: Handy, little printer
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient little machine for traveling or emergencies. Probably too expensive (ink cartridge) for everyday use but very simple to use and good printing. I have had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carey

customer_reviews.title: canon pixma i90
customer_reviews.text: See above...it's my second one...first one was stolen....the thief had good taste and probably read the reviews...great for traveling....I have the battery pack too which makes it even...."mo Bettah"
customer_reviews.author: Philip C. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I had doubts about a portable printer, but am very satisfied with the performance of this Cannon photo printer.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Pinney

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer has exceded my expectations. It does just what I wanted it to do. Print fine quality pictures and have a mobile footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond D. Bolch

customer_reviews.title: Pixma IP90
customer_reviews.text: Great portable printer, to take anywhere, or just use on the kitchen table. We bought it to take camping with us. It's small and light, and prints beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Canon PIXMA iP90 Photo Inkjet Printer
customer_reviews.text: Item is just as advertised...very compact for traveling, and the quality is fabulous. Be aware it does not come with the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Canon Pixma iP90 Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer. It is easily carried with you and is truly portable. The printing is excellent. I am very satisfied with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Grider

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used because I wanted another version of the same printer. This one worked great! I would buy another if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Non-working printer?
customer_reviews.text: I received it one day before my trip (driving) from arizona to washington D.C. It was two and a half weeks before i was able to set it up and use it. It did not work. i have the iP90 software loaded but the indication was that it was not connected. i even changed out the print cable in case one was bad. now that i have returned from my 5515 mile road trip i will have to take it somewhere to see if the problem is at my end or in the printer. Why does amazon not have a rating for something that doesn't work...If it works i may love it...i don't know for sure what the problem is...
customer_reviews.author: Kip M Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it to work
customer_reviews.text: After installing, I received flashing orange lights that indicated a paper jam. I removed a small sliver of paper but then the flashing orange lights changed to indicate ink not installed properly. I have removed and re-installed numerous times, including re-installing print head (per online manual instructions). I have worked with this printer for almost 3 hours and it is still not working. I've submitted a request to the service department online and I'm awaiting their response.
customer_reviews.author: Eva F. Luckie

customer_reviews.title: poor
customer_reviews.text: was very scratched up, disappointed that we could not get it to work with any computer, no usb cord, no software for drivers. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: G. R. DeCent

customer_reviews.title: iP90 Printer
customer_reviews.text: The seller misrepresented his product. He said the printer was a new unit; however, the printer was open box, which is an used printer. I spent hours with the seller trying to get the printer to work. After days I find out that the printer was a used item, and didn't work. In addition I called Canon regarding this iP90 printer, and there response was they don't make this printer any more!!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Spiler

customer_reviews.title: portable printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer is everything I expected. It prints fast and the quality is very good. It is easy to take down and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Lediard

customer_reviews.title: Printer was not working
customer_reviews.text: Printer was not working, ink seems dry, this printer did not print, is there a way to return it? Can I get my money back?
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Vedua

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: MACHINE GAVE US PROBLEMS AND I DID NOT HAVE THE TIME TO SEND IT BACK FOR A REFUND BECAUSE I NEEDED IT RIGHT AWAY
customer_reviews.author: venessa

customer_reviews.title: I Like it
customer_reviews.text: Image is sharp and color is good. I like this model because in addition to 4x6 photos, I can print 8x11 documents. The printer fits in my laptop bag and goes with me whenever I travel. It's only been a couple of weeks, but so far so good. I give the PIXMA iP90 an excellent review.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described, delivered as advised and has satisfied all requirements
customer_reviews.author: Brian Savill

product_meta.title: Canon PIXMA iP90 Photo Inkjet Printer (9466A001)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer Rugged, powerful and portable, the Canon PIXMA iP90 Photo Printer delivers exceptional performance at home or on the road. This compact printer can produce up to 16 ppm in black and up to 12 ppm in color, while achieving a resolution of up to 4,800 x 1,200 color dpi. Canon full-photolithography inkjet nozzle engineering uses a high-performance 1,088-nozzle print head that ejects precise and consistent droplets as small as two picoliters with remarkable accuracy. Your results: impressive resolution and dramatic detail on graphics and photos, wherever you're printing from.

 


This printer can connect directly to select digital cameras. Learn more about PictBridge. In a hotel room or a home office, the iP90 printer goes practically anywhere, yielding superb output on all your projects. Reports and memos will look clean and professional with bold, crisp text. Using the included Canon Easy-WebPrint Windows software, Web pages are automatically formatted, so they'll print properly with full color and without trimming off the right-hand margin. You can also produce 4-by-6, 5-by-7 and 8.5-by-11-inch borderless prints, with stunning edge-to-edge quality and razor-sharp detail. In only about 51 seconds you can print a 4-by-6-inch photo with the look and feel of a traditional photograph. And for convenience, you can connect any PictBridge compatible digital camera or DV camcorder directly to the iP90 printer and print photos--no PC required! Easy-PhotoPrint v3.0
While most photo-editing software applications will brighten the entire image, Easy-PhotoPrint 3.0 accurately detects the subject's face and adjusts the skin to the optimum tone. Brighten dark faces caused by bright backgrounds. Choose from one-click automatic to correct the entire image all at once, or manual to correct just a selected area. 

 

Before
After
 Easy-PhotoPrint 3.0 also lets you select and print any image on your PC, perfectly trim images, correct images using lab-quality retouching features, correct red-eye, smooth facial lines and skin tone, sharpen faces, remove blemishes, and print in a variety of sizes and layouts. 

 Photo Optimizer PRO
Photo Optimizer PRO does not simply adjust image data; it also makes adjustments in the printer driver. It assesses color balance, vividness, and brightness based on a histogram analysis of image data (raw image), and then makes ideal adjustments within the three-dimensional color space of the entire image, also making optimum use of the image's characteristics. Photo Optimizer PRO utilizes the functions of Bubble Jet printers to reproduce clear colors. Making multi-adjustments to a variety of images requires finetuning, because processes that are suitable for certain adjustments may be detrimental to other adjustments. 

 

 

Also, each image requires a different balance of adjustments. For these reasons, Canon has spent many years accumulating enormous volumes of data on what it found are the colors considered by most people to be the most beautiful. Based on these data, Canon has undertaken analyses of a huge number of images and devised an algorithm that allows well-balanced adjustments to be made for every single image pattern, even those with complex compositions and hues.  Canon Smart Ink Features
If you're on-the-go and low on ink the iP90 printer's "Ink Usage Control" setting enables you to produce approximately 1.5 times more pages without lowering print quality. Plus, if you run out of black ink, just choose the "Use Composite Black" option and the iP90 printer continues to print black using a composite of color inks in the "Ink Usage Control" setting. These features are a convenient safety net when you don't have extra ink on hand.

 Versatile, Wireless Printing
The iP90 printer offers both IrDA compatibility and an optional Bluetooth interface enabling you to print wirelessly from a PC, PDA or mobile phone. For maximum portability, an optional Canon car adapter and rechargeable battery kit provide power on the go.

 What's in the Box
Canon iP90 photo printer, iP90 printhead, BCI-15 black ink tank, BCI-16 color ink tank, power cord, universal AC adapter, setup software and user's guide CD-ROM, documentation kit; USB cable not included
feature_bullets: Up to 4,800 x 1,200 optimized dpi color, 600 x 600 dpi black
Up to 12 ppm color print speed, 16 ppm black
PictBridge support for direct-from-camera photo printing
Wireless printing with IrDA and optional Bluetooth
USB interface, PC and Mac compatible

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars171 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
